titles.title: Designating majority membership on certain standing committees of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/23/1993--Introduced. Elects: (1) Representative Sam Farr to the House Committees on Agriculture and Natural Resources; (2) Representative Peter W. Barca to the House Committees on Public Works and Transportation and Science, Space, and Technology; and (3) Representative Bennie G. Thompson to the House Committee on Small Business.
